text: hi there my name is Kristin Marie and
I'm gonna share with you my canoeing
technique so you want really hot water I
like to use tea water or I boil a pot
and spoons are really important they
should have a nice tip and I call it a
bum but a nice round bum not too wide
but a little longer and your ice creams
or bass should be pretty nice and firm
so I like to start with a nice clean
flat surface and then I use the corner
so you sort of go as if you're doing
backward skiing and you go up and sit it
down and then you roll it usually it's a
two to three turn roll and then you use
the edge to help you clean it up and use
your hand and the warmth to release it
you
that's how you know
you
